OPixels ‚Äì Creative Wallpaper and Photo Editor

Unleash your creativity and personalize your device with OPixels, a versatile app catering to your artistic flair. With a plethora of trendy stickers, artistic filters, and comic effects, OPixels lets you transform simple pictures into masterpieces. Not to mention, its live wallpapers can vividly animate your phone's backdrop. Whether you're aiming for humor or looking to forecast your future appearance, OPixels has a trick up its sleeve to amaze you.

üíµ Price:

OPixels can be downloaded for free. However, the VIP membership subscription and in-app purchases unlock additional content and an ad-free experience. Pricing is structured as follows:

  • Monthly Subscription: $19.99
  • Annual Subscription: $79.99 Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period üí≥.
